name: rgb_to_cmyk
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool convexity.
Tool description: Convexity is an Color-convertor API that offers endpoints for converting between different color representations, including RGB, HSL, and CMYK
API description: Converts an RGB color code to a CMYK color code using an external API.

r.description: The red component of the RGB color code (0-255).

g.description: The green component of the RGB color code (0-255).

b.description: The blue component of the RGB color code (0-255).
